comments:
To reproduce this problem, please use a workbench with Eclipse 3.0, EMF/XSD 2.0 
and GEF (or better WSWB 3.0M7) and extract all plugins from Hyades CVS HEAD 
(org.eclipse.hyades.*). I will attach a team project set to simplify this step 
(just import it in a new workspace).

This problem disappears (the full/workspace build works fine) if I disable the 
JET builder/nature (comment out the related entries in 
org.eclipse.emf.codgen/plugin.xml).

Here are the exceptions after the first workspace build (also in the UI I get 
an "Internal error: null" message box) done automatically after checkout:


!SESSION Feb 20, 2004 12:30:08.620 ---------------------------------------------
java.fullversion=J2RE 1.4.2 IBM Windows 32 build cndev-20040128 (JIT enabled: 
jitc)
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=en_US

How strange, this bug was fixed quite a while ago.
